segment.source: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview

segment.source: This parent checklist includes cross-reference links to important concepts about using certificates as an authentication option in either a domain isolation or server isolation design.
segment.target: This parent checklist includes cross-reference links to important concepts about using certificates as an authentication option in either a domain isolation or server isolation design.

segment.source: Note: Complete the tasks in this checklist in order.
segment.target: Note: Complete the tasks in this checklist in order.

segment.source: When a reference link takes you to a procedure, return to this topic after you complete the steps in that procedure so that you can proceed with the remaining tasks in this checklist
segment.target: When a reference link takes you to a procedure, return to this topic after you complete the steps in that procedure so that you can proceed with the remaining tasks in this checklist

segment.source: Checklist: Implementing certificate-based authentication
segment.target: Checklist: Implementing certificate-based authentication

segment.source: Task
segment.target: Task

segment.source: Reference
segment.target: Reference

segment.source: Review important concepts and examples for certificate-based authentication to determine if this design meets your deployment goals and the needs of your organization.
segment.target: Review important concepts and examples for certificate-based authentication to determine if this design meets your deployment goals and the needs of your organization.

segment.source: Identifying Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Deployment Goals
segment.target: Identifying Your Windows Firewall with Advanced Security Deployment Goals

segment.source: Certificate-based Isolation Policy Design
segment.target: Certificate-based Isolation Policy Design

segment.source: Certificate-based Isolation Policy Design Example
segment.target: Certificate-based Isolation Policy Design Example

segment.source: Planning Certificate-based Authentication
segment.target: Planning Certificate-based Authentication

segment.source: Install the Active Directory Certificate Services (AD CS) role as an enterprise root issuing certification authority (CA).
segment.target: Install the Active Directory Certificate Services (AD CS) role as an enterprise root issuing certification authority (CA).

segment.source: This step is required only if you have not already deployed a CA on your network.
segment.target: This step is required only if you have not already deployed a CA on your network.

segment.source: Configure the certificate template for workstation authentication certificates.
segment.target: Configure the certificate template for workstation authentication certificates.

segment.source: Configure the Workstation Authentication Certificate Template
segment.target: Configure the Workstation Authentication Certificate Template

segment.source: Configure Group Policy to automatically deploy certificates based on your template to workstation devices.
segment.target: Configure Group Policy to automatically deploy certificates based on your template to workstation devices.

segment.source: Configure Group Policy to Autoenroll and Deploy Certificates
segment.target: Configure Group Policy to Autoenroll and Deploy Certificates

segment.source: On a test device, refresh Group Policy and confirm that the certificate is installed.
segment.target: On a test device, refresh Group Policy and confirm that the certificate is installed.

segment.source: Confirm That Certificates Are Deployed Correctly
segment.target: Confirm That Certificates Are Deployed Correctly
